tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ForestCoverChanges (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    region_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    forest_type TEXT NOT NULL,
    year INT NOT NULL,
    forest_area_km2 DOUBLE PRECISION NOT NULL,
    reforestation_efforts TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ReforestationProjects (
  project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  success_rate DECIMAL(5,2)
);

CREATE TABLE MonitoringData (
    monitoring_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    area_name VARCHAR(255),
    date DATE,
    monitoring_type VARCHAR(50),
    observation TEXT
);
